Health Economics and Optimisation

Source: vignettes/health_econ_and_optimisation.Rmd
health_econ_and_optimisation.Rmd

This vignette demonstrates economics defaults, CE outputs, and budget optimisation.

library(chlaa)
set.seed(1)
pars <- cholera_parameters()
time <- 0:50
scenarios <- list(
  cholera_scenario("baseline", list()),
  cholera_scenario("wash_plus_cm", list(
    chlor_start = 10, chlor_end = 80, chlor_effect = 0.2,
    hyg_start = 10, hyg_end = 80, hyg_effect = 0.2,
    orc_start = 10, orc_end = 80, orc_capacity = pars$orc_capacity,
    ctc_start = 10, ctc_end = 80, ctc_capacity = pars$ctc_capacity
  ))
)
runs <- cholera_run_scenarios(pars, scenarios, time = time, n_particles = 30, dt = 1, seed = 1)
# Load default economics assumptions
econ <- cholera_econ_defaults()
str(econ)
#> List of 10
#>  $ cost_per_vaccine_dose           : num 2
#>  $ cost_per_orc_treatment          : num 10
#>  $ cost_per_ctc_treatment          : num 80
#>  $ cost_chlorination_per_person_day: num 0.02
#>  $ cost_hygiene_per_person_day     : num 0.03
#>  $ cost_latrine_per_person_day     : num 0.01
#>  $ cost_cati_per_person_day        : num 0.05
#>  $ dw_symptomatic                  : num 0.188
#>  $ duration_symptomatic_days       : num 7
#>  $ yll_per_death                   : num 30
# Scenario-level economics and NMB
cmp <- cholera_compare_scenarios(runs, baseline = "baseline", include_econ = TRUE, econ = econ, wtp = 1500)
cmp
#> # A tibble: 2 × 21
#>   scenario     infections cases_symptomatic deaths doses orc_treated ctc_treated
#>   <chr>             <dbl>             <dbl>  <dbl> <dbl>       <dbl>       <dbl>
#> 1 baseline        549057.           130516. 11130      0          0           0 
#> 2 wash_plus_cm    477030            101847.  5781.     0      12278.       3106.
#> # ℹ 14 more variables: infections_averted <dbl>, cases_averted <dbl>,
#> #   deaths_averted <dbl>, cost <dbl>, dalys <dbl>, cost_diff <dbl>,
#> #   dalys_averted <dbl>, icer_cost_per_daly_averted <dbl>,
#> #   icer_cost_per_death_averted <dbl>, mean_cost_vax <dbl>,
#> #   mean_cost_care <dbl>, mean_cost_wash <dbl>, nmb <dbl>, inmb <dbl>
# CEAC
ceac_tbl <- cholera_ceac(runs, baseline = "baseline", wtp = seq(0, 3000, by = 250), econ = econ)
head(ceac_tbl)
#> # A tibble: 6 × 3
#>   scenario       wtp prob_best
#>   <chr>        <dbl>     <dbl>
#> 1 baseline         0         1
#> 2 wash_plus_cm   250         1
#> 3 wash_plus_cm   500         1
#> 4 wash_plus_cm   750         1
#> 5 wash_plus_cm  1000         1
#> 6 wash_plus_cm  1250         1
# Constrained budget optimisation
opt <- cholera_optimise_budget(
  pars = pars,
  budget = 5e5,
  time = time,
  n_particles = 20,
  grid_size = 5,
  dt = 1,
  min_fraction = list(vax = 0.1),
  max_fraction = list(wash = 0.6),
  max_vax_doses_per_day = 5000
)
opt$best
#>   frac_vax frac_wash frac_care budget_vax budget_wash budget_care doses
#> 3     0.25       0.5      0.25     125000      250000      125000 62500
#>   wash_intensity deaths    cases
#> 3     0.08252459 7936.9 119664.9
head(opt$evaluations)
#>   frac_vax frac_wash frac_care budget_vax budget_wash budget_care doses
#> 1     0.25      0.00      0.75     125000           0      375000 62500
#> 2     0.25      0.25      0.50     125000      125000      250000 62500
#> 3     0.25      0.50      0.25     125000      250000      125000 62500
#> 4     0.50      0.00      0.50     250000           0      250000 70000
#> 5     0.50      0.25      0.25     250000      125000      125000 70000
#> 6     0.50      0.50      0.00     250000      250000           0 70000
#>   wash_intensity  deaths    cases
#> 1     0.00000000 8529.20 124050.6
#> 2     0.04126230 8081.55 121170.1
#> 3     0.08252459 7936.90 119664.9
#> 4     0.00000000 8520.00 123484.4
#> 5     0.04126230 8211.80 120952.1
#> 6     0.08252459 9963.20 125383.6
